content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 2, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 2, Watford 0.
Foul by Troy Deeney (Watford).
Kevin Stewart (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Christian Benteke (Liverpool) header from very close range is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Cameron Brannagan with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Christian Benteke (Liverpool) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Roberto Firmino.
Sebastian Prödl (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Benteke (Liverpool).
Substitution, Liverpool. Connor Randall replaces Alberto Moreno.
Jordon Ibe (Liverpool) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box. Assisted by Christian Benteke.
Attempt missed. Christian Benteke (Liverpool) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Roberto Firmino.

Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Simon Mignolet.
Attempt saved. Odion Ighalo (Watford) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Steven Berghuis.
Goal!  Liverpool 2, Watford 0. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sheyi Ojo.
Offside, Liverpool. Roberto Firmino tries a through ball, but Martin Skrtel is caught offside.
